community.alternativesubheader: Need help? Find skilled masters within the ecosystem

projects.subheader: Recently initiated projects in the {{ecoverse}} Ecoverse
projects.new-project: Starting a new project is easy. In just a few steps your project is good to go. Set the scope, allocate resources, pick your hero’s and let stakeholders vote for your proposal. When everyone has signed the fun can begin. Let’s get started!
